attributes.title: very bad do not download
attributes.review: everything was fine until i downloaded this app. itâ€™s definitely giving me bad luck, if you donâ€™t want bad luck then donâ€™t get this. i got this app yesterday, the same day as my birthday. the candles on my bday cake were burning while everyone was singing for me and wax got all over my cake. we couldnâ€™t eat it. it was crazy. the wax not only got onto the cake and ruined it but it also got all over the table and my little cousin alex. alex is only 3 years old and the poor girl had to go to the hospital because the wax from the candles gave her super bad burns. she wasnâ€™t able to come back for the rest of my party. i still needed a cake so we found some betty crocker red velvet cake mix, but it was old. iâ€™m talking 4 years and 20 days past itâ€™s best by date. but, it had to do. the cake needed frosting so my mom put me in charge of making cream cheese frosting. i took the cream cheese and put it into the microwave for 3 minutes to soften it. about 40 seconds in the arkin and sparkin began. then the cream cheese went into flames. my grandma ran to the microwave to turn it off, which was very impressive because she is 87 with very bad arthritis but she still managed to run. the sound of her knees cracking with every step she took echoed throughout the kitchen. but she wasnâ€™t fast enough. the flame got bigger and the whole microwave went into flames. my mom took the sprayer from the sink and aimed it towards the flames to try and put it out. grandma lost most of her hair from the flames, now her head looks as bald as a newly hatched bird. so basically because of this app my cake is ruined, alex is burnt, grandma has slim to none hair, and the kitchen now has 5k worth of damages. DO NOT get this app!
